DOC.HEADLINE: PAN AFRICAN FILM FEST SETS OUTREACH PROGRAM
DOC.TEXT: The third annual Pan African Film Festival , to be held at Laemmle Sunset 5 Theatres Oct . 12-26 , is inviting L.A. County middle- and high-school teachers to have their students participate in StudentFest , a cinematic educational outreach program . Students will be bused to the theater for a free screening of " More Time , " a film from Zimbabwe focusing_on the universal problems of youth in this time of AIDS , and discussions with filmmakers and community leaders . Interested teachers and administrators may call the film festival office at ( 213 ) 295-1706 .
